title: A curly one...
content:
wondering what this font could be??

author: NZTrent

comments.content: I believe that is the lovely [Affair](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122064707/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000181) by Alejandro Paul. :)
